channel.title: Pimpscape glitch
channel.description: Been looking everywhere in the search's and under all kinds of different things and i cant find out how to fix the gap in the characters jaw.. I looked for about 30 minutes and now its tie time to post. I found a tut on cheezescape and a few others that said "cheezescape maybe others" and I tried them and i got 100 errors on a few backups.. Somebody post how to fix it here or PM it to me.. Thanks

item.title: Pimpscape glitch
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Go in the Player.java file, and find the thing that says

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); }

And then right under that it should say

	playerProps.writeWord(0);

replace that with


			if(playerLook[0] == 0 && !Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat])){

			playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard);

			} else {

			playerProps.writeByte(0);

Read full topic
